ygData.subject: Dragons and Bards.
ygData.msgSnippet: Starting a new thread. So who would you want? A L41 bard, twisting Elemental (47 magic, 47 heat, 47 cold) Guardian  (47 magic) or A L50 bard, twisting
ygData.messageBody:
Starting a new thread.

So who would you want?

A L41 bard, twisting Elemental (47 magic, 47 heat, 47 cold)
Guardian (47 magic)

or

A L50 bard, twisting Elemental (56 magic, 56 heat, 56 cold)
Guardian (56 magic)

[I think I got those numbers right, correct me if I'm wrong]

It's really a no brainer, to me.

All the servers that I know of currently have no excuse for bringing
anyone less than L49, unless:

1) you are just funning around, wow a dragon, cool.
2) it's your guild event, and you are up for dying.
3) it's your friends who happen to all be L50, and just you are lower.

The elite guild, as much as I dislike them, on our server killed
Nagafen less than 90 mins after the server came up. They are all L50,
and have the best stuff in the game. They know exactly what to do with
less than 25 people. For that, I respect them. But that's about it.

All other guilds who have attempted Vox have failed, and failed
badly. From what I understand you have to have to right people.
Since the pool of available people is large on most servers, why
in the world would you pick a knowledgable lower level person over
a knowledgable higher level one? You cannot bring everyone, so
who do you bring?

Harmonic.
